item.title: Jennifer Hudson - I Remember Me
item.description:
I remember me
staring at myself
See these same
two eyes
See these same
two feet

who I used to be
You still look
the same
But you don’t

somewhere my affection

your way

all for me

to be true
You’re the perfect man
for me I love you I do
You’re the perfect man
for me
I love you
I do do~
